welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gillingham, a charming town known for its rich maritime history and beautiful countryside. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that Gillingham has to offer.

restaurants.name: Gillingham Tandoori
restaurants.description: Gillingham Tandoori is a indian restaurant located in Dorset.

restaurants.name: Hunters Lodge Inn
restaurants.description: Hunters Lodge Inn is a gastropub located in Somerset.

restaurants.description: Wagtail is a restaurant located in Wincanton.

restaurants.name: Reeve The Baker

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport handles all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private jet travelers, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, London City Airport offers a dedicated terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.
